meanings.definition: The quality or state of being trainable.
meanings.sent1: Her trainabilities were evident from the way she quickly learned new tasks.
meanings.sent2: The puppy's trainabilities made it easy to teach him tricks.
meanings.sent3: His trainabilities were put to the test when he had to learn how to juggle.
meanings.sent4: The trainabilities of the new employees shone brightly during the intensive training program.
meanings.sent5: The trainabilities of the students were truly impressive, showing great potential for growth.

meanings.definition: The ability to be trained or developed.
meanings.sent1: The trainabilities of the athletes were honed through rigorous practice.
meanings.sent2: The trainabilities of the team members were crucial for their success.
meanings.sent3: The trainabilities of the plants in the garden surprised everyone with their rapid growth.
meanings.sent4: The trainabilities of the software proved to be essential for its usability.
meanings.sent5: The trainabilities of the students were nurtured through engaging educational activities.
